content:
This is not troubleshooting, just a question, that I assumed only core dev team would know the answer to :innocent:
What changes (besides deleting/adding files) forces a "major release"?

Due to the nature of changes to the current draft this will be a major release (3.0)
There is #5819 to track this, as the guides are not very complete on this one.
Changes to files are the main thing, possibly the only thing.
